description: Singular Detached Villa with an approximate constructed area of 601 m² and surrounded by a spacious 927 m² plot. Distributed over three floors, with a modern and versatile architectural criterion, favoring maximum use of its numerous rooms, at different heights, with large horizontal windows and vertical windows throughout its perimeter, resulting in magnificent luminosity throughout. the day. The peculiarity of this property and its undeniable added value lies in its hybrid conception: it is a wonderful home (in loft style), but above all it is a magnificent work and creation space for an artist (sculptor, painter, photographer, architect... ); Furthermore, the construction was carried out with excellent materials and a solid metal structure that structures the building, achieving a perfect balance between functionality and comfort. All of this gives it a special level of habitability, making it quiet and cozy, and can be easily modified according to the needs or aesthetic tastes of the new owners. We provide a very complete photographic report, as well as various plans of the Property, where we can corroborate the interest of this "special product", its multiple layouts and in short: its many possibilities. Located in the municipality of Fuente el Saz de Jarama, close to the urban center, it has all kinds of services, both healthcare and educational, commercial (Mercadona just a hundred meters away) and a quick road connection with the capital; an idyllic place where you can reside comfortably throughout the year. IBI: 1322 euros Ford: 55 euros WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSIONS TO OUR BUYING CUSTOMERS.

description: FIRST LEVEL REAL ESTATE SELLS this spectacular farm of €7,000 meters with an independent villa of 474 square meters, located in a quiet area with wonderful views of the mountains and Madrid. The breadth of the plot allows you to have different areas of consolidated garden, plantations of fruit trees, vineyards, orchard area, free meadow, etc. The house is distributed on a main floor at ground level that consists of a spacious living room with fireplace, a large kitchen, 4 bedrooms (the main one with an en-suite bathroom) and 2 bathrooms. On the lower floor we find a huge multipurpose room, cellar and garage. It is an ideal location to be able to live in an exclusive environment, surrounded by nature and at a distance of 5 minutes from the municipality of Fuente El Saz, equipped with all services such as supermarkets, schools, medical center, etc... and 20-30 minutes from the capital, which allows it to be a habitual residence for people who work in Madrid. There are bus lines a few meters from the farm to communicate with nearby municipalities and access the capital. It is also equipped with an indoor pool attached to the house on the main floor, an old-fashioned construction oven and a legalized well for water consumption. In addition, at the entrance to the farm there is another independent construction used as a garage or storage for farm tools. Organize a visit with us to personally assess all the virtues of this wonderful property.

Incredible opportunity to acquire an independent villa in the quiet area of Fuente el Saz de Jarama. This property has easy parking and a large 748m2 plot, ideal for enjoying the outdoors. Nice semi-detached villa in Fuente el Saz Engel and Völkers presents this beautiful semi-detached house with high quality materials and elements in the best area of Fuente el Saz del Jarama. Distributed in four spacious and comfortable floors which are accessed through a large staircase illuminated with natural light we find the following distribution. Main floor with large entrance hall, large living room, bathroom, kitchen with all amenities and direct access to the garden. On the first floor we have a large garage with capacity for up to three vehicles, boiler room and multipurpose space. On the second floor we have four bedrooms, one with en suite bathroom and another bathroom. On the top floor we have a fully open and equipped attic. On the outside we have a large patio with multiple possibilities and a large covered porch. The location is perfect as it is a corner villa with what has great light throughout the day. The interior carpentry is oak and the exterior has thermal bridge with automatic blinds and mosquito nets. It has pre-installation of air conditioning ducts. Fuente el Saz is a municipality located in the northeast of the Community of Madrid, with a population of about 6,000 inhabitants, is located just 30 km from Puerta del Sol. It borders with Algete, Valdetorres del Jarama and El Casar.  The municipality has three kindergartens, one public and two private and a public school for kindergarten, primary and secondary education. A few kilometers away we also have the Trinity College and the Sek. It is located in a natural environment, next to the Vega del Rio Jarama and the Sierra de Guadarrama. The main access roads are the A-1, the M-50, the R-2 and the M-111 that gives access to Barajas. It has a public transport service to Madrid-Plaza Castilla (bus 184 and 197). This magnificent location is ideal for those who want to enjoy an atmosphere of tranquility surrounded by a natural environment where you can enjoy different outdoor sports such as horse riding or golf. It also has an industrial area and a wide gastronomic offer.

description: VISTA HOMES presents an exclusive independent villa on a single floor of 300 m2 built on a 2,500 m2 property. It consists of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room with fireplace, exterior porch of 24 m2 at the entrance of the house and a second exterior porch of 108 m2 with pergola and direct access to the kitchen of the house.9.5 x 5 pool with 180 m2 solarium, construction garage of approximately 50 m2.and an outdoor covered parking area of 41 m2, separate machine room and storage room. The total construction between housing, garage and warehouse amounts to 300 m2.The pool is normal chlorination with a one-year-old programmer and purifier only. Access to the plot is easy and simple, with an automated gate for vehicles.The fence of the property is 50m2 linear masonry and has double access; one pedestrian for visitors or guests and another for carriages (automatic). A covered exterior porch has been built in the house with the possibility of enclosure and thus can be incorporated into the home if desired.It has dimensions of 24 m2 (6 m wide x 4 m deep). The house is on one floor with the following distribution: 1.Entrance hall that distributes the different rooms.In front of it is the kitchen, with access to another exterior porch of 108 m2.It is delivered fully equipped with furniture and appliances. In this same area of the house is the service area; with a separate exterior bedroom and bathroom with shower and tile on the walls. two.The living-dining room is independent from the private area of the house.It is located to the left of the entrance to the house and has three different orientations.It has three very large windows and is very bright.It also has a cozy fireplace with a cassette and is in proper working order. 3.The main room has a dressing area, it is very cozy and bright thanks to the 160 cm window. Four.The other two rooms are twins; one of them with a large wardrobe and sliding doors.The second room also has a wardrobe with 3 folding doors. QUALITIES All the windows are PVC tilt-and-turn windows measuring 6X4X6 and 1.20 mThe living room, kitchen and service room are made of stoneware and smooth paint on all the walls. GARAGE The garage has a total area of 46 m2 and is completely closed with a folding door.The space allows parking for two vehicles, motorcycles and bicycles.If desired, there is also room to use a storage area. Annexed to the garage is the home's machine room, where they are housed; the thermos with a capacity of 250 l, the electrical panel of the property and the electric boiler of the house. In addition, the house has pre-installation for a boiler and diesel tank. CHARACTERISTICS OF THE PLOT. Due to its design and location, the property offers great privacy, even though it is close to other buildings.The plot is consolidated, has a size of 50 m x 50 m, is completely flat and perfectly usable to create other spaces for use and enjoyment. The plot consists of a well with a 50 m drilling, a 3,000 liter cistern for domestic use and 8,000 liters of cistern for hazardous use.It also has a descaler. SEWER with connection to the general and electricity contracted with the electric company.It also has fiber optics to telework from home. Ideal for families with children and people who love horses, due to the high number of Equestrian Centers in the area.Located near shopping areas (Mercadona, ALDI, Ahorra Más) and close to all types of services (Institutes, schools, daycares, sports areas, pharmacies).

description: FIRST LEVEL REAL ESTATE SELLS this magnificent house located on rustic land of 4,000 square meters in the municipality of Fuente el Saz, 5 minutes from the urban center and 20-30 minutes from Madrid. It has fireplaces, windows with thermal break, security shutters and noble materials (oak wood and marble). Wrought iron bars throughout the house. Heated pool with slide, separate booth with jacuzzi. Well. The distribution of the house consists of 3 floors: In the underground floor: we find a garage for 5 vehicles, storage room, gym, 1 bedroom, bathroom, and several exits to the outside of the house. On the 1st floor: hall, kitchen with access to a side porch, 70m2 living-dining room on 2 levels with access to the pool, 2 suite-type rooms, 1 office, 1 courtesy toilet. Several porches. In silver 2: 3 huge suite rooms, with dressing rooms and independent bathrooms. Also with terraces. Highlight the materials and construction qualities of the house.

NEWLY CONSTRUCTED HOUSING 135 m2 duplex with 3 floors. Ground floor with its own access from the street, first with living room, kitchen, 1 bedroom and bathroom and second attic with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, it also has a 52 m2 garden. Single-layer white china facade. It has a fully furnished kitchen tiled to the ceiling, underfloor heating. It has air conditioning with heat pump and Aerothermal Energy with storage tank with up to 70% savings in production. Top quality brand toiletries. Porcelain stoneware tiles and wooden flooring. It has Fiber Optic installation. All plastic and smooth paint on ceilings and walls. Financed payment facilities. PRICE: €324,000 + 10% VAT.

description: Detached villa with a large plot 20 minutes from Madrid. In one of the areas with the greatest potential in the northeast of Madrid due to its density and development, is this independent property located between Fuente del Saz de Jarama and the Santo Domingo Urbanization. Its location brings together the best of the rural and urban world for those who want a quiet life without giving up proximity to the capital. This home is ideal for those citizens looking for a more secluded but at the same time modern property with the latest technologies and qualities, as the recently comprehensively renovated home stands on a 2,378m2 plot with cemented road accesses, swimming pool, Wooded areas and gardens, covered garage for 3 cars, gazebo building, warehouse and own well. The house has on the ground floor an open space for a living room with fireplace, dining room and kitchen, whose objective is to make the most of the environment, the views and daytime life with its maximum use. Also on this floor we find a service room with a full bathroom and a shower for pets. On the second floor the staircase leads us to two corner rooms with 270º views and the main room, with a large terrace overlooking the plot and with a spectacular dressing room and en-suite bathroom. On the third floor and under cover, the structure gives us one more room, independent and comfortable to live in.

LADY CASA SELLS, spectacular home, especially comfortable since the main spaces are distributed on a single floor with direct access from the garden. From the general gate you can access the main entrance with a cozy porch.The main door, armored, gives access to a hall where we find a guest bathroom, a door to the semi-basement floor and a wardrobe.From the hall you go up to a large living room of approximately 50 m2 with two rooms, a guest bathroom and access to the semi-basement floor. Continuing through the entrance hall, to the right we have a large 25 m2 living room or dining room with large windows that connect with the main ground floor, which is at ground level, with three direct accesses from the garden. On the main ground floor there is a third living room with a cassette fireplace and the large island kitchen with a comfortable dining area with built-in benches, both with direct access to the garden. Through a hallway we find a bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub, and the 5 bedrooms that the house has.The spectacular master bedroom also has a dressing room and a large en-suite bathroom with a shower cabin and jacuzzi for 6 people. The semi-basement floor has a large area that can be used as a games room or wine cellar and, separated by a door, a laundry area, a bathroom with a shower and a small bedroom. As for the garden that surrounds the house, given its dimensions, it offers multiple areas.It has a swimming pool, a garden, an area equipped with swings, an area with a table and chairs as a gazebo, and a seating area with a bench to relax. Finally, inside the property we find the garage with automatic gates, with workshop space and suitable for two large cars and a storage room, which is accessed through two gates from the street and that connect with a private access to the property. Tilt-and-turn windows and white aluminum enclosures with thermal break, it also has folding mosquito nets and lockable bars on the doors and all the windows.The walls are painted with smooth paint. The house is located in a very quiet area, on the outskirts of the urban area of Fuente el Saz, with views of the Valdeolmos mountain, without homes in front or the possibility of future constructions, but with all services such as supermarkets, schools, medical center, etc,. It is a 5-minute walk from the bus stop and with direct access to the M111 that connects in 25 minutes to Plaza Castilla or Barajas, which allows it to be a regular residence for people who work in Madrid.

Terraced town house a few meters from the Plaza de Fuente El Saz. The house needs reforms. It has 2 floors. On the ground floor (102 m2) there is a living room, 3 bedrooms, a complete bathroom in good condition and a fitted kitchen with access to the patio or garden. The upper floor is an attic (60 m2) with the original wooden beams. The plot has 409 m2, there is a large warehouse or storage room (75 m2), the plot faces 2 streets. Fantastic location. This property has infinite possibilities.

"MAYAC INMOBILIARIA" offers this SPECTACULAR INDEPENDENT VILLA for sale in Fuente el Saz del Jarama. Located 15 minutes from the A-1 and 25 minutes from Madrid, this town has all the necessary services: schools, medical center, sports centers, public transport, supermarkets, etc. The house is built on a 490 m2 plot and is distributed over 4 floors: The main floor has a large living-dining room, an equipped kitchen, two bedrooms (one of them double that leads to the terrace) and a full bathroom. On the ground floor we have a large hall with access to the garden, the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and dressing room, three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a complete bathroom with a bathtub. On the top floor we find an open-plan attic, currently used as a laundry area. In the basement there is a large living room, games room (it can be used for different purposes due to its large size), jacuzzi, toilet and boiler room. The garden is fully conditioned and ready to enjoy with the family. It is completely paved, has a full bathroom, fitted kitchen, saline pool with high-resistance automatic blinds. This exclusive home boasts the best qualities on the market (which provides us with considerable energy savings): aerothermal energy, aluminum windows with double security glazing and automatic blinds, white lacquered interior carpentry, smooth paint, porcelain floors (interior and exterior). etc DO YOU WANT MORE INFORMATION? CALL US AND COME VISIT THE BEST HOUSING IN THE AREA! WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER!

VISTA HOMES presents an EXCLUSIVE TOWNHOUSE WITH PRIVATE POOL AND EXTERIOR GLASSED PORCH in Fuente el Saz de Jarama.It has 280 m2 built on three floors and was built in 1995 with top quality materials. LOW LEVEL. Paved exterior area on both sides of the house, both at the main entrance and in the rear area where the property's private pool and barbecue are located. DOUBLE ENTRANCE DOOR TO THE HOUSE; one glazed to insulate and maintain the interior temperature of the house and the second for security. At the entrance we find a hall that distributes rooms; To the left is the recently renovated GUEST TOILET with designer porcelain tiles.Next, a WOODEN DRESSING ROOM has been built for the comfort of family and friends. A double glass door opens the way to the kitchen.It is fully furnished and equipped with appliances, has an office area and views of the garden at the entrance of the house.The location of THE KITCHEN on this floor allows it to be joined to the living-dining room area if desired. THE LIVING ROOM is large and very bright, with direct access to the rear garden. It is perfect for FAMILIES THAT LIVE AND ENJOY THEIRS; They like to organize meals at home, parties or watch a soccer game with friends. The POOL and the exterior PORCH are accessed from the living room, through two double climalit doors and two iron extras that guarantee security.We can choose to take a bath first while we prepare the barbecue fire (construction).We will have lunch with our family on the glassed-in porch, which also has a rest area and sofas. On the SECOND FLOOR, the distributor gives way to a world of luxury and comfort.A master bedroom with double windows and walk-in closets on the sides, with an en-suite designer bathroom and shower. The other two rooms are spectacular and are completely separated from the main one.They are full of light and are very large in size.Both have built-in wardrobes and have the same orientation.The bathroom that serves the auxiliary rooms has a bathtub and its style is similar to the main one. LOWER FLOOR From inside the house we also access the Garage and the storage room. The owners have created a laundry space for the family, with ventilation and natural light on this same floor. SOURCE EL SAZ It is a municipality located in the Northeast of the Community of Madrid, with a population of about 6,000 inhabitants, it is located just 30 km from Puerta del Sol.It borders with Algete, Valdetorres del Jarama and Casar. The municipality has public and private daycare centers, a public school for early childhood, primary and secondary education.It also has a sports center and municipal swimming pool.A few kilometers away we also have several charter and private schools.It also has a health center and hypermarkets. SITUATION Natural environment, next to the Vega del Rio Jarama and the Sierra de Guadarrama.The main access roads are the A-1, the M-50, the R-2 and the M-111, which gives access to Barajas.It has a Public Transport Service to Madrid-Plaza Castilla (bus 184 and 197). This magnificent location is ideal for those who want to enjoy an atmosphere of tranquility surrounded by a natural environment where they can enjoy different outdoor sports such as horse riding or golf. The house is air-conditioned by individual oil heating and has double windows to improve thermal insulation. The house is built on a flat plot of 3,240 m² with natural grass and large established trees. It has a tennis court and swimming pool with a built-in staircase. In the pool there is a changing room area. The garden has a changing room area for the pool, barbecue area, cellar where the diesel tank is located, and covered outdoor parking for five vehicles. It has well water for irrigation and the pool. Fuente el Saz de Jarama is a municipality belonging to the Community of Madrid. The town has 3 bus lines, connecting two of them with Madrid at the Plaza de Castilla station, and three daycare centers (one public and two private) and a public school for early childhood, primary and secondary education. With the possibility of purchasing it in its current situation or with the renovation completed, this light-filled single-story house is perfect for those looking for a bright and spacious home. Furthermore, everything can be changed and adapted to your needs, with our energy efficiency advice to make your home a sustainable and welcoming place. Located in a gated community in Fuente del Saz, this property has a 2,500m2 PLOT with SWIMMING POOL, perfect for enjoying the outdoors on summer days. With 362m2 built, including a 50m2 porch, the distribution on a single floor makes it easy to move between the different areas of the house.
